more about this site

this site is under active development as of today: click on this sentence to view the live project.

The domain I use for my personal website has its registration renewed at the end of May every year. On its anniversary, I decided to rewrite the site from scratch.

There are several Easter Eggs (PDF download) being added to the site on a semi-regular basis. One can simply go through the source code to find them, but I believe that the satisfaction of stumbling across one at random far outweighs the satisfaction of a passionate egg-hunt.

[ TIP: on desktop screens, hover over things ]


In addition to using plain HTML and CSS, I built (read: continue to build) this website using the following:
  • Eleventy, a static site generator
  • Netlify, a dynamic web-hosting platform
  • Liquid, a templating language by Shopify
  • Nunjucks, a templating engine for JavaScript by Mozilla

The usual suspects in my production environment are:
  • Node, an asynchronous event-driven JavaScript runtime
  • npx, an NPM package runner
  • Git, a distributed version control system
